name: ScrollBar
description: Scrollable container with animated gradient overlay for horizontal scroll

props.name: useList
props.description: Whether to use a FlatList. NOTE: you must pass 'data' and 'renderItem' props as well

props.name: containerView
props.description: The element to use as a container, instead of a View

props.name: containerProps
props.description: The props to pass the container

props.name: gradientHeight
props.description: The gradient's height, defaults to the component's height

props.name: gradientMargins
props.description: The gradient's margins for the edge

props.name: gradientImage
props.description: The gradient's image, instead of the default image

props.name: focusIndex
props.description: The index to currently focus on
